snippet: An Ohio community is trying to fight the heroin epidemic by bringing a misdemeanor charge against drug users who are revived by emergency responders using an overdose antidote....

headline.main: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe
headline.print_headline: French President Calls for a Multi-Speed Europe

lead_paragraph: An Ohio community is trying to fight the heroin epidemic by bringing a misdemeanor charge against drug users who are revived by emergency responders using an overdose antidote.
